attributes.action: apologise to Damian Green (MP) for his arrest, as well as the search of his home, constituency and parliamentary offices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the recent police action taken against Mr. Green MP was unreasonably heavy-handed.

We reject suggestions that Mr. Green as a Member of Parliament would leak any material that might endanger national security.

We believe that the Prime Minister should have been informed in advance about serious & planned police action against a Member of Parliament (but this petition does not speculate as to whether he was informed). If he was not informed, the Prime Minister should apologise that his civil service failed in this regard. If he was informed, the Prime Minister should apologise that he did not intervene to stop an excessive police response.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
